definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
close friend in a distant land, far-flung realms as next door/close in spirit although far away
pinyin: hai3 nei4 cun2 zhi1 ji3 , tian1 ya2 ruo4 bi3 lin2
containing_words.word: 海內存知己，天涯若比鄰

sentences.english: The coupling of the processors is carried out by the Video-RAM).
sentences.chinese: 兩個處理器由視頻內存相連。

sentences.english: Memory allocation failures should reduce the use of this flag.
sentences.chinese: 如果內存分配失敗過多，應該減少這個標記的使用。

sentences.english: You're incrementing this chunk of memory.
Many of these can be derived from the schematics or the memory configuration of your target hardware.
sentences.chinese: 許多這些可以來源於圖表或對內存配置的目標硬件。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減少內存消耗，先要找出內存的消耗大戶。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減少內存消耗，先要找出內存的消耗大戶。

sentences.english: All that data has to be kept in memory and managed efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 所有數據必須高效地保存在內存中並加以管理。

sentences.english: Please Populate Memory in Pairs for Normal Operation.
sentences.chinese: 請成對安裝內存模塊以使其正常運行。

sentences.english: Most of the time this is due to insufficient memory.
sentences.chinese: 大多數時候，這是由於內存不足。

sentences.english: Each operating system makes its own unique demands on available memory resources.
sentences.chinese: 每個操作系統都有自己對可用內存資源的獨特需求。

sentences.english: All of them have their uses when tunning a memory-hungry program.
sentences.chinese: 當調整渴求內存的程序時它們各有用處。

sentences.english: Listing 2. A smaller trim threshold might save space.
sentences.chinese: 一個更小的內存消減閾值可能節省內存空間。

sentences.english: Listing 2. A smaller trim threshold might save space.
sentences.chinese: 一個更小的內存消減閾值可能節省內存空間。

sentences.english: The slot manager sets up its database in a region of shared memory.
sentences.chinese: 槽管理器在共享內存區域設置其數據庫。

sentences.english: It will also have more memory and a more powerful graphics processor, they said.
sentences.chinese: 它將擁有更多的內存以及更強大的圖形處理器。

sentences.english: My guess is that the garbage collector spends a considerable amount of time with collecting memory.
sentences.chinese: 我猜測垃圾回收器話費了相當多的時間去回收內存。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
